p: In a completely different research area, the electrochemical behaviour of the nucleobases thymine and thymidine was investigated in [bmim][BF 4], observing one- and two-electron reduction peaks, respectively [ 60], as it is shown in Figure 12. The chronoamperometric fit and the cyclic voltammetry at different scan rates confirmed an irreversible one-electron transfer in both thymine and thymidine.
